issue.title: m.blogtruyen.vn
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 36

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blogtruyen.vn/c752309/shoukan-sareta-kenja-wa-isekai-wo-yuku-saikyou-nano-wa-fuyou-zaiko-no-item-deshita-chap-9

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I suggest using the filter `m.blogtruyen.vn##center > a[href^='https://affiliate.w88ud1.net/']`
https://affiliate.w88ud1.net is a page that advertises a lot on Vietnamese-language websites
`center >` used to defeat css precedence

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

![Ảnh chụp màn hình 2022-12-24 075120](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/209416073-f61390f3-0c11-4983-bac6-52be3ad20f70.jpeg)
</details>


<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

4.4.4

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Quick reminder if you want me to stop making issue tickets than stop not responding anymore on the ones already made again I am paying for AdGuard so I don’t understand why I have to make multiple issue tickets just to get a response now with that out of the way 

Okay, so I’m gonna try this way you all seem to be having no issue Alex, BlazDT, Zolyden,yougotskinny, and Krystian watching multiple videos on gaypornhdfree.com with your AdGuard active so clearly the issue is not with Adguard than it’s either with my phone, my internet provider, internet protocol, or I just didn’t follow the steps exactly and or in the correct order 

So please thoroughly explain the step by step process and the order of the process you did to accomplish Adguard never being detected when trying to play videos on gaypornhdfree.com

if I can determine with your help that I have now with confirmation followed the steps to the letter that you all followed to accomplish this,

than I can check this one off and realize it’s an issue with my phone, internet provider, or my internet protocol, 

but I want know unless one of you explains thoroughly what you did of step by step and the order to make gaypornhdfree.com never detect AdGuard each time, 


So please respond as asap with the detailed instructions of what you did 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Quick reminder if you want me to stop making issue tickets than stop not responding anymore on the ones already made again I am paying for AdGuard so I don’t understand why I have to make multiple issue tickets just to get a response now with that out of the way 

Okay, so I’m gonna try this way you all seem to be having no issue Alex, BlazDT, Zolyden,yougotskinny, and Krystian watching multiple videos on gaypornhdfree.com with your AdGuard active so clearly the issue is not with Adguard than it’s either with my phone, my internet provider, internet protocol, or I just didn’t follow the steps exactly and or in the correct order

comment.body:
> iOS Safari thinks the iframe (embedded website) is their own, so when the embedded page requests google.com, iOS Safari treats that request as its own. Example:
> 
> Main page embeds secondary website. Secondary website makes request to google.com. On iOS Safari that request gets counted as if the main page made the connection. On Chrome Windows that request to Google.com is treated correctly made from secondary website.
> 
> --
> 
> With the help of iframes you can include live content from other websites in the own page (unless that other website is prohibiting it).

Oh I think I get it now what your saying is the embedded site dood.re which was remotely hosting its video on gaypornhdfree.com was confusing IOS safari into thinking we were on dood.re and not gaypornhdfree.com? 

Otherwise I don’t understand what you mean by IOS safari thinking it owns? because IOS is the operating system of iPhones with built in safari so by own if that’s not what you meant then the only other thing I can think you mean is it thought it was a built in thing of safari? 

I’m just confuse by what you mean own I’m trying to put it together 

so basically when the embedded website dood.re in gaypornhdfree.com was requesting. Safari iOS assumed we were on dood.re.com and it was making the request? When truthfully the only thing while I’m on gaypornhdfree safari iOS owns is gaypornhdfree because gaypornhdfree is the site so far being used through safari iOS? And not dood.re only it’s embedded website in a square platform is on gaypornhdfree so basically safari iOS is not actually on dood.re, dood.re is just being hosted on the site safari iOS actually is on which is gaypornhdfree.com?

issue.title: Some videos are being mistaken as ads I assume because of the ads embedded in some of the embedded videos
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So gaypornhdfree.com is no longer detecting my adgaurd premium at all it’s working perfectly however some videos have been blocked I assume it’s because some of the embedded videos from dood.re which are being on gaypornhdfree inspect element have embedded ads so adguard I assume is not being able to distinguish the two and is mistaking the embedded video with embedded as ads an ad it’s self. Is there anyway this can be resolved of separating the line of code of the ads and the kind of code that make up the video so only the line of code that makes up the ads is blocked so that I can still view the video?2. 


Here is a video url links to certain videos on gaypornhdfree.com that I have no access to as long as adguard keeps blocking them as ads 


https://gaypornhdfree.com/giuspel-favio-vador-behind-the-scenes-in-the-park/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/ethan-chase-ridick/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/






Part of me is worried if any of you attempt this could it jeopardize what has already been in state of gaypornhdfree no longer detecting my adblocker???

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![C2E79D47-ED34-478B-BE50-999C915A7E7C](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/209419496-5f681322-8843-4843-a123-bb40dda36eae.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
